thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Mena

author: Mena
title: Mena
text:
I like using both the web app and the mobile app. Two issues I would advise the design and development teams address are as follows.
1. It's not always clear that as a poster I have to wait for the person actioning my task to request payment before I see the "release funds" button. It would be good if there's a message indicating this.
2. Even after my task was completed and reviewed, I still got emails warning me that it was about to expire.
